parameters.queue: Cobran√ßas - Dois dias antes do vencimento

parameters.content:
# üìå AUTH INICIAL CONTA AZUL

## 1. CRIA APLICA√á√ÉO EM: 
`` https://developers-portal.contaazul.com/#/``
## 2. GERA CODE DE AUTORIZA√á√ÉO COM:
``
https://auth.contaazul.com/login?response_type=code&client_id={client_id}&redirect_uri={sua-url-de-calback-n8n}&state=ESTADO&scope=openid+profile+aws.cognito.signin.user.admin
``

## 3. TROQUE O CODE PELO TOKEN COM (M√âTODO POST):
``
curl --location 'https://auth.contaazul.com/oauth2/token' \
--header 'Authorization: Basic BASE64(SEU_CLIENT_ID:SEU_CLIENT_SECRET)' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--data-urlencode 'code=CODIGO_AUTORIZACAO' \
--data-urlencode 'grant_type=authorization_code' \
--data-urlencode 'redirect_uri=SUA_URL_REDIRECIONAMENTO'
``

## 4. RENOVE O TOKEN COM:
``
curl --location 'https://auth.contaazul.com/oauth2/token' \
--header 'Authorization: Basic BASE64(SEU_CLIENT_ID:SEU_CLIENT_SECRET)' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--data-urlencode 'refresh_token=REFRESH_TOKEN_GERADO' \
--data-urlencode 'grant_type=refresh_token'
``

parameters.query:
UPDATE variaveis_globais_n8n
SET valor_variavel = CASE 
    WHEN id = 16 THEN '{{$node["HTTP Request4"].json["id_token"] }}'
    WHEN id = 15 THEN '{{ $node["HTTP Request4"].json["access_token"] }}'
    WHEN id = 13 THEN '{{ $node["HTTP Request4"].json["refresh_token"] }}'
END
WHERE id IN (16, 15, 13);

error.message: 401 - "{\"error_description\":\"The access token is invalid or has expired\",\"error\":\"invalid_token\"}\n"
